title: Can i get my cash back ?
body: Well im realy bored of this game i was gold 5 now silver 1 with a bad mmr as fuck im getting like soraka top malphite jungle full ad afk jungle trynda in a row its realy impossible to play i dont wanna play this game anymore, so how can i get refund ? you guys can delete my account.

replies.body:
We can delete your account if you choose, and it would be placed in a waiting period before we do so just in case you change your mind. You'll need to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) first though! 

If you have refund tokens available you could use those, but as far as getting money back you can also discuss that in your ticket as well. Be sure to refer to our [**content refund faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).
